cobblemon.species.flosile.name: Flosile
cobblemon.species.flosile.desc1: Known for keeping flowers intact, its tail can power by photosynthesis.
cobblemon.species.salile.name: Salile
cobblemon.species.shamander.name: Shamander
cobblemon.species.flosile.name: Flosile
cobblemon.species.stoake.name: Stoake
cobblemon.species.stoake.desc1: May look dangerous, but is docile to humans, known for keeping both itself and humans warm.
cobblemon.species.magmink.name: Magmink
cobblemon.species.magmink.desc1: It burns anything in its presence, keeping a Magmink at bay is a hard task.
cobblemon.species.volcarine.name: Volcarine
cobblemon.species.volcarine.desc: It can run as fast as a race car, and yet, its speed can be as fast as a speeding rocket and will ram at its enemies which it can create fire explosion on impact.
cobblemon.species.moulash.name: Moulash
cobblemon.species.moulash.desc1: Known for excellent eyesight, it is known for heeding warning, it really hates Wingulls.
cobblemon.species.blundertross.name: Blundertross
cobblemon.species.albacannon.name: Albacannon
cobblemon.species.xylobone.name: Xylobone
cobblemon.species.xylobone.desc1: Xylobone are often considered creepy, but also sort of cute in its own way. The music it makes on its ribs makes it a popular novelty Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.dethmantle.name: Dethmantle
cobblemon.species.dethmantle.desc1: Dethmantle is dubbed as the 'Demon of Death Metal' by musicians, since its bass sound can create unnatural bizarre vibes.
cobblemon.species.babeau.name: Babeau
cobblemon.species.babeau.desc1: What looks like a shirt and pants are actually just thick fur, allowing it to thrive in freezing temperatures. Trainers unfamiliar with the Pokemon assume it's just a human boy.
cobblemon.species.karatage.name: Karatage
cobblemon.species.karatage.desc1: Karatage has been known for being the excellent display by physical education teachers for high school students. Can break 50 planks in one force palm.
cobblemon.species.karatage.desc2: Babeau has been amalgamated with a fragment of a T-Meteorite, and evolved into this Karatage that creates an energy disc that it can cut through titanium like paper.
cobblemon.species.yandement.name: Yandement
cobblemon.species.yandement.desc1: Its behavior is quite pitless, It is also seen being alone at night. Some people and Pokémon can be intimidated by looking at Yandement.
cobblemon.species.yandement.desc2: Its titanium arm has plasma energy that allows it to shoot at its enemy through their weak points without a miss. Yandement can be arrogant, but is quite a mastermind.
cobblemon.species.glideau.name: Glideau
cobblemon.species.glideau.desc1: His body is squishy, able to withstand long falls, allowing it to glide down tall buildings. It prefers soft landings regardless.
cobblemon.species.glideaux.name: Glideau
cobblemon.species.glideaux.desc1: A different Glideau from an unknown dimension. It creates a sky-blue aurora so beautiful, but is a trap to signal for the X Pokemon to attack.
cobblemon.species.mykeau.name: Mykeau
cobblemon.species.babette.name: Babette
cobblemon.species.babette.desc1: What looks like a shirt and skirt are actually just thick fur, allowing it to thrive in freezing temperatures. Trainers unfamiliar with the Pokemon assume it's just a human girl.
cobblemon.species.sailine.name: Sailine
cobblemon.species.sailine.desc1: Sailine are said to have fast enough reflexes to catch a bullet between their fingers. They use these reflexes in battles to make themselves hard to hit.
cobblemon.species.sailine.desc2: As a mutation from the S-Meteorite, it is quite bratty and rude to others. The only downside is it lacks physical strength, but now it has greater control over gravity, allowing it to hover.
cobblemon.species.yanditrix.name: Yanditrix
cobblemon.species.yanditrix.desc1: Yanditrix loves being in crush with its trainer, but whenever it sees a female Pokémon getting along with it, It will fight it without mercy.
cobblemon.species.yanditrix.desc2: Yanditrix appears to be quite playful and shows no danger toward humans and children, A meteorite amalgamated into it developed a stable mentality.
cobblemon.species.cryomette.name: Cryomette
cobblemon.species.cryomette.desc1: It possesses the power to manipulate ice, but unless it learned something else as a Babette that's all it can do. It has a reputation of being stupid for this reason.
cobblemon.species.cryomettex.name: Cryomette
cobblemon.species.cryomettex.desc: A different Cryomette from an unknown dimension. Its body emits a heatwave to the point the interior bursts into flames.
cobblemon.species.oniette.name: Oniette
cobblemon.species.oniette.desc: When extremely frightened, arm-like shadowy protrusions pierce from two openings on its back and attack the foe's soul.
cobblemon.species.pixight.name: Pixight
cobblemon.species.pixightx.name: Pixight
cobblemon.species.luminix.name: Luminix
cobblemon.species.luminixx.name: Luminix
cobblemon.species.sparkless.name: Sparkless
cobblemon.species.sparklessx.name: Sparkless
cobblemon.species.linernel.name: Linernel
cobblemon.species.linernel.desc1: Linernel is quite a smart Pokémon, leaving tasks to be easier for people.
cobblemon.species.linernel.desc2: This variant is often owned by lots of trainers because it is quite popular than its Xetopian variant.
cobblemon.species.debiave.name: Debiave
cobblemon.species.ubunitual.name: Ubunitual
cobblemon.species.ubunitual.desc1: Its development originates from the Isle of Armor 15 years ago, As of result, this Pokémon is now easily trainable by human trainers.
cobblemon.species.gentone.name: Gentone
cobblemon.species.sabylon.name: Sabylon
cobblemon.species.auroncer.name: Auroncer
cobblemon.species.doshell.name: Doshell
cobblemon.species.windoware.name: Windoware
cobblemon.species.windoware.desc1: It's sponsored by a company and it's the most popular OS Pokémon all around the world, MS Pendrives are always in high demand.
cobblemon.species.darshell.name: Darshell
cobblemon.species.machintech.name: Machintech
cobblemon.species.appladoo.name: Appladoo
cobblemon.species.appladoo.desc1: Though it looks like Pumpkaboo, Appladoo is a completely different species. A sight of it will make the harvest the best of the year.
cobblemon.species.ringousine.name: Ringousine
cobblemon.species.ringousine.desc1: It's able to resolve complex mathematic calculations due to the outstanding grass fibers of vegetable cells of neuronal connections inside. Having a Ringousine will guarantee a good harvest.
cobblemon.species.teentric.name: Teentric
cobblemon.species.teentric.desc1: Teentric is a sour-tasting Pokemon and uses this fact to deter predators. This can change based on berries it eats, but in a pinch, it can be made sweet by boiling it.
cobblemon.species.lemion.name: Lemion
cobblemon.species.lemion.desc1: Lemion can generate an electric barrier that can magnetize and attract any iron object at its radius, including Steel-type Pokémon, which involuntarily leads to dangerous territorial fights with Aggron.
cobblemon.species.oracket.name: Oracket
cobblemon.species.oracket.desc1: Oracket has an innate passion for hitting balls, that likely inspired the tennis sport. The balls it hits destroy rocks with a mystic power.
cobblemon.species.swilime.name: Swilime
cobblemon.species.swilime.desc1: It's playful with the volleyball bubble it can make, it's been a master of beach activities with children. Swilime has a feisty temper that only a talented trainer can overcome it.
cobblemon.species.graspeed.name: Graspeed
cobblemon.species.graspeed.desc1: Always on its grapefruit wheels, Graspeed skates with a speedy passion, able to reach kilometers that almost break the sound barrier. There have been recordings of Graspeed singing in human-like language when it's in a good mood.
cobblemon.species.liength.name: Liength
cobblemon.species.liength.desc1: Liength likes to roar against stronger Pokémon as a way to challenge them since it ignores the danger. It constantly lifts boulders that are twice its size.
cobblemon.species.manixie.name: Manixie
cobblemon.species.manixie.desc1: Manixie was barely visible during ancient times, it was thought to be a sprite of the woods. Likes to prank people often.
cobblemon.species.manixie.desc2: Ancient stories tell about this Pokemon being in the company of a Manaight and Managic, who fought ancient evil that forged a flying fortress.
cobblemon.species.soaringkite.name: Soaring Kite
cobblemon.species.soaringkite.desc1: It has similar features to a grassy pterosaur that was covered in a paranormal magazine, but the two have little else in common.
cobblemon.species.forteleo.name: Forte Leo
cobblemon.species.forteleo.desc1: It resembles a mysterious Pokémon described in a paranormal magazine as the primal Liength from one billion years ago.
cobblemon.species.spritepixel.name: Sprite Pixel
cobblemon.species.spritepixel.desc1: It resembles a Pokémon from a paranormal magazine that mentions a video game mascot that became popular enough to be mass produced as merchandise toy.
Evolve Babeau and Babette into each 4 different forms
advancements.cobblemon.catch_beastfamily: Catch Liength, Manixie, Cowble, and Blissprit
advancements.cobblemon.alteia_catch.desc: Catch both Mystical Manixie and Broken Bond Sailine
